>
[Rusting Carapace](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1853)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 19 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 476 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Leather Lamellar](/Armor.aspx?ID=29)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This [_+1_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2785) [_leather lamellar_](/Armor.aspx?ID=29) _armor_ incorporates the plates of an [ore louse’s](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2665) hide, woven together with the creature’s own sinew into a functional set of armor. While wearing the _rusting carapace_, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC and saving throws against any effect that would rust you or your items, such as the ore louse’s Strikes that have the rust ability or the [_rust cloud_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1377) spell.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** Oxidizing liquid seeps from between the segments of the rusting hide onto a nearby metal creature, non-magical metal hazard, or non-magical metal item of up to 1 Bulk. A targeted creature or hazard gets a DC 24 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=2247) Fortitude save; a targeted item automatically gets a critical failure if unattended, but a creature holding or wearing it can attempt a DC 24 basic Reflex save. The rust deals 8d6 damage to a creature or hazard, plus 2d6 [persistent damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=86) on a failed save; it deals 2d6 damage to an item, plus 1d6 persistent damage on a failed save.

**Craft Requirements** The initial raw materials must include the hide of a [ore louse](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2665).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
